ygData.subject: RE: my mistmoore drum...
ygData.msgSnippet: When i was low 20 s my friends were high 20 s and we were in mm. Well someone pulled a big train through to the zone with the gypsies.  Anyways, after multiple
ygData.messageBody:
When i was low 20's my friends were high 20's and we were in mm. Well
someone pulled a big train through to the zone with the gypsies. Anyways,
after multiple zones and rezones. the zone was finally clear, we head down
the ramp and what do we see.... the named gypsie alone by the little lake
with a charmed magician and his pet. We went for it. We almost bit it as
the magician was attacking us as he was charmed, his pet was on us, and the
gypsie charmed our druid as well... Needless to say it wasnt pleasant to get
bit in the butt while i was trying to kill off the pet and had the magician
on me as well. But finally the rest of the group finished her off, the druid
became uncharmed and we had to cast about 10 uncharm spells on the magicians
to get him uncharmed *was really crazy*

But hey, im not complaining, no one died and i had my mm drum when i was
lev21 or so. And 2 nights later my buddies bought the lute of gypsie
princess for 5pp from a guy in the zone. Too bad it doesnt do squat!

Minkin Nehoc
Solusek Ro
30th level bard

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Arwen [SMTP:arwen@...]
> Sent: August 27, 1999 5:13 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Special Bard Instruments
>
> From: "Arwen" <arwen@...>
>
> I have the mistmoor drums. I got them off a castle train when I was about
> 32. My group was at the zone when we heard "TRAIN! CHOO CHOO A COMING
> THROUGH" We saw every imaginable creature at the zone..heh I was charmed
> almost immediately and got to watch my friends slice me to bits (grin).
> Well
> they droppped me, they dropped the named gypsy..and they looted and ran.
> When I got back they presented me with my very own battledrums. Do I
> recommed going after her before your 40?..NO..but if you do..PLEASE use
> as
> much magic resist as possible to save yourself from being charmed! Since
> mm
> castle trains (at least on MY server) are an ever occuring thing, one can
> concievabley camp the zone for the gypsy. Harmonic..I know what your
> thinking..NO I won't help you get them :) The offer for sol A still stands
> though :)
>
> Elyana Silvanae
> Bardess of the 36th chorus
> Innorruk Server
>
> -->I have been told that a named gypsy NPC drops the battle drum. Don't
> have
> >one myself but looking forward to it. I have only been in Mistmoore 3-4
> >times but on two of those occasions someone was auctioning the battle
> drum
> >for 500PP.
> >BTW, one time someone pulled a train of the gypsies to the zone. There
> were
> >two regular gypsies and the named gypsy. I had just zoned in. There
> were
> >about 10 other players at the zone trying to fight them. People started
> >dropping like flies
> > That leads me to believe you need a group of 30+ players to
> >survive against the gypsies.
> >
> >Galtin of E'ci
> >
>
>
